column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Sɛ hom du Keenan asaase no do a
column7: (iyi nye asaase a ɔda hɔ ma hom dɛ egyapadze
column8: mekyerɛ Keenan asaase no dɛ mbrɛ n’ahe tsetsee

column2: "ɔno hom pomu afamu nkyɛn mfi Zin sar do wɔ Edom nkyɛn mu
column3: na hom pomu ɔhe mfi Nkyen Epo ano wɔ boka afamu:"

column2: "na hom ɔhe no ndan mfa Akrabbim mfowee pomu afamu
column3: na ontwa mu nkɔ Zin: na n’edzifir ndu Kades-barnea pomu afamu; na ɔnkɔ Hazar-adar

column2: "na ɔhe no mpon mfi Azmon nkɔ Egypt ɔwora ho
column3: na n’edzifir ndu po no ano."

column2: "Na anee afamu ɔhe no dze
column3: hom wɔ po kɛse no dze yɛ ne he: iyi na ɔnyɛ hom anee ɔhe."

column2: "Na iyi nyɛ hom kwaamu ɔhe: hom mfi po kɛse no ho nsan bepɔw Hor mfa:"
"bepɔw Hor ho na hom mfi nsan mbrɛ wɔfa kɔ Hamat; na ɔhe no n’edzifir ndu Zedad:"
"na ɔhe no mfir edzi nkɔ Zifron
column3: na n’edzifir ndu Hazar-enan: iyi na ɔnyɛ hom kwaamu ɔhe."

column2: "Na hom nsan boka he mfa mfi Hazar-enan nkɔ Sefam:"
"na ɔhe no mfi Sefam nsian nkɔ Ribla
column4: na ɔhe no nsian araa nkodu Kinneret pomu afamu wɔ boka afamu:"

column2: "na ɔhe no nsian nkodu Jordan do
column3: na n’edzifir ndu Nkyen Po ho: iyi nye hom asaase dɛ mbrɛ no ho ahe tsetsee."

column2: "Na Moses hyɛɛ Israelmba no mbra dɛ
column3: Iyi nye asaase a hom ntwe ho tonto mfa nkyɛ no a EWURADZE ahyɛ dɛ wɔmfa mma mbusuakuw akron

column2: "nye Reubenmba ebusuakuw
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee nye Gadmba ebusuakuw dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi tsetsee

column2: "na mbusuakuw ebien no nye ebusuakuw ɔfa no enya hɔn egyapadze wɔ Jeriko Jordan egya wɔ boka afamu ɔdze kɔ wipuei no."
"Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Iyinom nye mbanyin a wɔnkyɛ asaase no mu mma hom no hɔn edzin: ɔsɔfo Eleazar

column2: "Na hom nyi ebusuakuw biara mu ɔbapɔmba kor ma wɔnkyɛ asaase no mu."
"Na mbanyin no hɔn edzin nye yi: Juda n’ebusuakuw mu
"Simeon ne mba ebusuakuw mu
"Benjamin n’ebusuakuw mu
"Nye Dan ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba
"Josef ne mba mu: Manaasɛ ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba
"nye Efraim ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba
"Na Zebulun ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba
"Na Isakar ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba
"Na Aser ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba
"Na Naftali ne mba ebusuakuw mu ɔbapɔmba
"Iyinom nye hɔn a EWURADZE hyɛɛ hɔn dɛ wɔnkyɛ Keenan asaase no mu mma Israelmba no."
